name: European Breakfast Cereal Association
membership: Member of FoodDrinkEurope, the European food and drink federation
goal:
The European Breakfast Cereal Association represents the breakfast cereal and oat milling industries in the EU. Its members are 9 associations in 8 European countries and 11 companies.
CEEREAL is proactive in anticipating potential issues of relevance to the sector, and provides input on issues that affect the breakfast cereal and oat milling industries.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
